text: James "Jimmy" McGill (business name Saul Goodman) is a fictional character in the TV series Breaking Bad and the protagonist of the spin-off TV series Better Call Saul played by actor Bob Odenkirk. He is a major character in the Breaking Bad franchise by Vince Gilligan. Saul Goodman is a lawyer based in Albuquerque, New Mexico, and is the brother of Charles "Chuck" McGill. Category:Television characters Category:Fictional American people
title: Saul Goodman
